name: dizzily
content:
dizzily adverb
(FEELING/MAKING DIZZY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel as if everything is turning around, and that you are not able to balance and may fall over: Her face was drawn with pain and she swayed dizzily against the door. The room spun dizzily and the next thing I knew I was on the floor looking up. The skyscrapers towered dizzily above us. T
